name: Soulivion II
description:
Soulivion II is an immersive fantasy role-playing game with an in-depth demonic companion.

You are able to play the story your way, with the player choice being our guiding gameplay mechanic.

After finding yourself in the Nowhere, you die entering the afterlife.

This is where you start to build out your story.

Soulivion II presents the new world of Sorrowmire to battle and explore, along with its three new areas, the hub of Krux Ketch, and portal travel to different realms.

Battle with a sword or bow in live ABS-style combat, a far cry from our standard turn base system.

Active live combat puts the player first in fighting, unlike our other games.

Battle demons, monsters and everything in middle as you attempt the impossible of achieving your desired ending.

Who will you save, enlist, or discover as you traverse the lands?

Dominate the afterlife and decide the fate of everything.
